Psychology Expert: For the first move against an unknown opponent, people tend to choose Rock slightly more often than the other options. Studies show Rock is chosen approximately 35% of the time, Paper 35%, and Scissors 30%. If we want to exploit this tendency, Paper might be a marginally better first move.

Statistical Analyst: Without any previous data on this specific opponent, we can only rely on general statistical patterns. As the Psychology Expert noted, Rock is slightly favored as a first move by many players, which would make Paper a reasonable counter.
